40ddfc90-ab38-407a-9660-b3af5a9c38bc.name: Combat Reflexes
40ddfc90-ab38-407a-9660-b3af5a9c38bc.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

8a530813-aebc-4db8-bb1d-0914b58cef0e.name: Directional
8a530813-aebc-4db8-bb1d-0914b58cef0e.notes: @Direction: Back, Right, Left, Top or Underside@

490e6ca8-b8fc-47e0-8338-d83abc624220.name: Normal
490e6ca8-b8fc-47e0-8338-d83abc624220.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

0456d4f6-ad8e-4f44-8bd5-8690f8711eb1.name: Very
0456d4f6-ad8e-4f44-8bd5-8690f8711eb1.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

6dfe6ca8-4bea-467d-9a3e-f6a69636949f.name: High Pain Threshold
6dfe6ca8-4bea-467d-9a3e-f6a69636949f.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

a745f08b-4d54-4843-a9e5-b4b12433135a.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

dab4614e-33af-48ad-bc75-da4ad23563a4.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

f3424809-05c5-4680-95e1-79cd0dbc3a66.name: Legal Enforcement Powers (@Federal or Secret Service@)

c9b4937a-4cf4-4252-ba3e-2ef8025b3708.name: Wise Master
c9b4937a-4cf4-4252-ba3e-2ef8025b3708.notes: Choose 20 points. You can add your template's IQ-, Will-, or Per-based skills.

2d933b83-b3bb-4ffd-b44f-9fbb590311fb.name: Luck, Extraordinary
2d933b83-b3bb-4ffd-b44f-9fbb590311fb.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

6e729719-d30e-4228-969f-7e13b6789a9a.name: Luck
6e729719-d30e-4228-969f-7e13b6789a9a.notes: Usable once per hour of play

2b8bc402-dbef-455b-89ae-9e4c760a737b.name: Urban Jungle Gym
2b8bc402-dbef-455b-89ae-9e4c760a737b.notes: When not in combat, "urban" obstacles require no skill rolls and have no effect on Move.

98f0eba9-7811-4b51-8b4a-05c60c9968fb.name: "I can win any chase on foot!

20642e28-3064-4a38-b0b2-ab642fb4b824.name: Chummy
20642e28-3064-4a38-b0b2-ab642fb4b824.notes: React to others at +2; -1 to IQ-based skills when alone

74ae9835-f81a-4391-9d0e-a1799f08953e.name: Vow (No alcohol, drugs, or fatty food, just "health food")

a6423486-8bb9-4eaf-aaea-6d1bd8e7ae86.name: Martial Arts Perks
a6423486-8bb9-4eaf-aaea-6d1bd8e7ae86.notes: Distribute 15 points between these and Martial Arts Skills.

6b772c0f-6a35-4a64-999a-67d5318217bf.name: Choose 18 points
6b772c0f-6a35-4a64-999a-67d5318217bf.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

d195d9fe-7ad2-49d6-8c57-a33935aed628.name: Intelligence
d195d9fe-7ad2-49d6-8c57-a33935aed628.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

47afd6ef-4ffb-4ca0-b456-0ff3b2139bc6.name: Choose 16 points
47afd6ef-4ffb-4ca0-b456-0ff3b2139bc6.notes: Either two or six of those points may be used to increase one of these skills by one or two levels.

05370933-591d-4bd4-ba18-a066276c39b0.name: Choose 18 points
05370933-591d-4bd4-ba18-a066276c39b0.notes: Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

591fe4a8-eeb4-4e2d-b61a-485efe340f43.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

3457eb93-8c0c-4e96-be2d-a91936c25355.notes: 20 points in your template's IQ-, Will-, or Per-based skills.

5fa2f224-3a8c-4c6a-8733-213103cbf2e2.notes: Distribute 15 points between these and Martial Arts Perks.
